scripts.convert:buildscript: npx esbuild convert.js --outfile=./dist/convert/convert.cjs --bundle --platform=node --target=es2020 --format=cjs && rm -rf example/uikit/ && node ./dist/convert/convert.cjs
scripts.clean: yarn clean:dist; yarn clean:packages; yarn clean:modules; yarn clean:package-modules
scripts.clean:modules: rm -rf node_modules yarn.lock package-lock.json lerna-debug.log yarn-error.log
scripts.clean:packages: lerna exec -- rm -rf dist yarn.lock yarn-error.log package-lock.json
scripts.clean:package-modules: lerna exec -- rm -rf node_modules yarn.lock yarn-error.log package-lock.json
